en: I know you find yourself somewhat... astray,
et: Ma tean, et oled pisut... eksinud,

en: but worry not, for I am here to guide you before I depart.
et: kuid ära põe, olen siin sind aitamaks enne oma lahkumist

en: I have devoted my years to the defense of this tower.
et: Olen oma eluaastad pühendanud selle torni kaitsesse.

en: Now, my time has come to pass on this duty.
et: Nüüd on saabunud aeg anda see kohustus edasi.

en: What lies within this tower is beyond my knowledge,
et: Siin tornis peituv on mulle arusaamatu,

en: but I know that whatever it is, if it were to fall into the wrong hands...
et: kuid tean, et hoolimata sellest, mis see on, kui see satuks valedesse kätesse...

en: ...and so, the secret of the tower remains safe and secure, for now...
et: …seega on torni saladus hetkeks veel kaitstud...

key: More content will be coming soon
en: More content will be coming soon
